creditline: The Anne and Hadlai Hull Fund
description: three black men in front of an adobe-like wall at night; two men in front push on each other with their forearms, while shirtless man in back partially crouches and looks beneath other men's arms; man at right wears a cowboy hat; both men in foreground wear denim jackets, rolled-up jeans and boots
signed: on back in pencil: Sory Sanle 2017 / LES COW-BOYS DE LA BROUSSE, 1971/2017
title: Les Cow-Boys de la Brousse
